channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dog or Human waste on stairs, 22nd February
item.description:
Dog or Human faeces on the stairwell between the ground and 1st floors. Unable to use the stairs to exit the building, unable to use the lift for even floors as there is a lift in there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 198, Portland Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Rat spotted, 22nd February
item.description:
Rat spotted running through this litter (it had gone when I took my phone out). This is close to a children's play area and a public park. It's a health hazard as much as a litter issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spenser Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipping - see details below, 22nd February
item.description:

item.title: Bin bags full of old cushions on pavement, 22nd February
item.description:
Someone has dumped some bin bags full of old cushions on the pavement outside the gate to the private residences on Clonbrock Rd. They are spilling out on the pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shakspeare Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover., 22nd February
item.description:
Urgent: A loose drain cover is causing several issues. At the moment the photo was taken, the cover happened to be sitting correctly over the holes, but for the past couple of days it has repeatedly come loose. This has already caused a motorbike incident and damage to cars. Vehicles driving over it keep shifting it out of place, and drivers have had to stop in the middle of the road to put the cover back. At one point, someone even placed rubbish bags on top of it to prevent other vehicles from getting stuck. There is also constant noise at all hours when cars drive over it or when people try to reposition it. This needs to be properly fixed as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rouel Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cover round crossing light broken., 22nd February
item.description:
This has been like this for a while. Not sure if it is dangerous. Not sure what the broken cover is made of. It is quite windy at the moment and I am concerned that it may break off and may be of a danger to pedestrians or motorists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Crescent, Longlands, Greater London
